cutSceneDialogue.locDialogueBody: Spock to Captain Kirk. Sir, we have neutralized the Romulan warbird. Are you and Dr. McCoy ready to beam back aboard the Enterprise?
And that looks like our cue to beam out as well. What do you say, Bones, are you ready to head for home...
I’m sorry, Jim. My place is with Burnham and Worf. You see… You aren’t even real, my friend.
What do you mean I’m not rea--
One moment... I’m getting an energy reading. And it’s growing.
From the artifact?
No - this is coming from.. Somewhere else. The signature appears to resemble some sort of wormhole.... And it’s forming right on top of us!

cutSceneDialogue.locDialogueBody: Ah, Doctor McCoy. A pleasure to hear your voice. And you as well, Michael, after all this time.
Wait...  you two know each other? How?
A story for another time. Unfortunately, Captain Kirk is missing. The shuttle he was aboard has vanished.
Long range scans detect a Federation distress signal on Trigon VII, the planet you are orbiting... It could be from the captain.
Your assistance in locating him would be appreciated. Enterprise out.
Was that really him? Was it Spock?
No… His resonance signature is consistent with the Nexus. The real Spock is still out there, somewhere…
Then he is no more than a phantom. Still, we do not know if the Kirk he described is real or not. We should investigate.

cutSceneDialogue.locDialogueBody: Jim! Is that you, man?
Bones! I’ve never been happier to see you!
But what on earth are you doing here? Who are your friends?
Commander Burnham of the U.S.S. Discovery. It’s a pleasure, Captain.
And I am Lieutenant Worf of the Enterprise. It's an honor, Captain. I studied your exploits at the Academy. They were most impressive.
The U.S.S. Discovery? A Klingon... on the Enterprise?
An Enterprise from the future, Jim. Wherever we ended up has scrambled the timeline.
That would explain Romulans and the Gorn working together. Follow me, we’ve got work to do!
Well, he sure looks like the real deal. Worf, what do you say? Tell me that’s Jim over there!
I’m afraid not, Doctor. It is another one of the Nexus’ creations.
But I believe we should follow him. Let us see how this plays out.

cutSceneDialogue.locDialogueBody: So... Captain. Any idea why does this Gorn “Father of Nests” want you so badly?
I wasn't sure at first, until they referred to me as his “greatest adversary”...
You mean it's the same one you fought after the Cestus III attack?
It’s the only Gorn I’ve ever met. As Spock would say, it’s…
Yeah, yeah.
Cestus III? The frontier colony?
That’s the one. The Gorn attacked it, but before we could defeat them the Gorn Captain and I were taken by a powerful race called the Metrons.
They stuck the two of us on a desolate world and had us fight it out for their amusement. I won, barely. Spared the Gorn’s life.
And now he thanks you for your mercy by plotting with the Romulans!
Well, we didn’t part on the best of terms…
Captain, it’s possible that all of these enemies may just be creations of this dimension we’re trapped in.... this “Nexus”.
Well, they certainly hit hard enough to be real. And I certainly feel real. Can we really take the chance they’re not?

cutSceneDialogue.locDialogueBody: So it is you!
<And you... my oldest, finest adversary.>
Why are you doing this? I let you live!
<Before you, Human-Kirk, I was unbeaten. A champion of my people.>
<Until you bested me. For all my strength and might, I tasted defeat for the first time, and at the hands of a lesser species.>
You think I cheated you. Unfairly robbed you of your prestige
<Cheated? No, Human-Kirk. You won with ingenuity and bravery. The only worthy opponent I had ever faced.>
<Now come. Let’s see us see if you can do so again.>

cutSceneDialogue.locDialogueBody: Spock to Captain Kirk. Sir, we have neutralized the Romulan warbird. Are you and Dr. McCoy ready to beam back aboard the Enterprise?
And that looks like our cue to beam out as well. What do you say, Bones, are you ready to head for home...
I’m sorry, Jim. My place is with Burnham and Worf. You see… You aren’t even real, my friend.
What do you mean I’m not rea--
One moment... I’m getting an energy reading. And it’s growing.
From the artifact?
No - this is coming from.. Somewhere else. The signature appears to resemble some sort of wormhole.... And it’s forming right on top of us!
